comments.body: this should actually go before the trap. we don't want to down twice on failure or sigint
Which does not harm. It's idempotent. Feel free to move it one line up.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +80,84 @@    make clean all && \
    trap 'timeout 5m ./cluster/kube-down.sh' EXIT && \
    ./cluster/kube-down.sh && \
    ./cluster/kube-up.sh && \
    trap 'test \$? != 0 && export MESOS_DOCKER_DUMP_LOGS=true; timeout 5m ./cluster/kube-down.sh' EXIT && \
